original_text: Solomon’s wisdom was greater than the wisdom of all the people of the East, and greater than all the wisdom of Egypt.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 지혜가 동쪽 모든 사람의 지혜와 애굽의 모든 지혜보다 뛰어난지라

sentences.original_text: than the wisdom of all the people of the East
and greater than all the wisdom of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이집트의 모든 지혜보다 더 컸다
